ceterms:assessmentOutput: Multiple choice questions, Hands-on field portion
ceterms:description: This certification is intended for those individuals who conduct building performance audits, including measurement and verification services with related building analysis. Individuals may also specify, sell, coordinate and/or install certain building performance work.

ceterms:estimatedCost.ceterms:description: The cost of the online and field exams depends on the BPI Test Center providing the exams. BPIâ€™s recommended list prices for the exams are $250 for online and $500 for field.
ceterms:estimatedCost.ceterms:name: Exam Fees

ceterms:keyword: Heating System Distribution (Hydronic and Forced Air)
ceterms:name: Building Analyst Professional Certification Exam
ceterms:processStandardsDescription: Processing time for exam results: 2-4 weeks
